projectGridLines.title: 1  React Native, 2  Backend Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Title: React Native Intern

Description: React Native or React (willing to learn RN) or students who have built good projects on any mobile technologies.

Skill sets: React Native, Expo, JavaScript, Typescript

Traits expectation: Fast learner, team player

Expected learning: Android & iOS

Specific courses required for project execution: NA

Title: Backend Intern

Description: Seeking individuals who are passionate about technology and software development, with a strong interest in problem solving

Skill sets:

?     Required - Strong problem-solving and algorithmic skills

?     Big plus - Experience in backend technologies

Traits expectation:

?     Enthusiasm for technology and software development

?     Strong logical thinking and puzzle-solving abilities

Expected learning:

?     Hands-on experience with backend development

?     Practical exposure to solving real-world technology challenges

Specific courses required for project execution: NA
